refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: x = distfun_ncfrnd(v1,v2,delta) x = distfun_ncfrnd(v1,v2,delta,[m,n]) x = distfun_ncfrnd(v1,v2,delta,m,n)

listitem.para: a matrix of doubles, numerator degrees of freedom, v1>0 (can be non integer).
a matrix of doubles, denominator degrees of freedom, v2>0 (can be non integer).
a matrix of doubles, the noncentrality parameter, delta>=0
a 1-by-1 matrix of floating point integers, the number of rows of x
a 1-by-1 matrix of floating point integers, the number of columns of x
a matrix of doubles, the random numbers in the set [0,âˆž).

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Generates random variables from the Noncentral F-distribution function.
Any scalar input argument is expanded to a matrix of doubles of the same size as the other input arguments.

refsection.title: Examples
